mapper.select: SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),MTR_CD),3,'자재입고량 합계',TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS IN_DATE, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),MTR_CD),1,TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' 소계',3,'-',MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, SUM(IN_AMT) AS CNT, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),MTR_CD) as gpId FROM MTR_IN WHERE TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , MTR_CD) ORDER BY IN_DATE, gpId, MTR_CD

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM'),MTR_CD),3,'자재입고량 합계',TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')) AS IN_DATE, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM'),MTR_CD),1,TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')||' 소계',3,'-',MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, SUM(IN_AMT) AS CNT, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM'),MTR_CD) as gpId FROM MTR_IN WHERE TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM'),MTR_CD) ORDER BY IN_DATE, gpId, MTR_CD

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY'),MTR_CD),3,'자재입고량 합계',TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY')) AS IN_DATE, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY'),MTR_CD),1,TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY')||' 소계',3,'-',MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, SUM(IN_AMT) AS CNT, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY'),MTR_CD) as gpId FROM MTR_IN WHERE TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY') , MTR_CD) ORDER BY IN_DATE, gpId, MTR_CD

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD, IN_DATE),3,'자재입고량 합계', MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD, IN_DATE),1,MTR_CD||' 소계',3,'-', IN_DATE) AS IN_DATE, SUM(IN_AMT) AS CNT FROM MTR_IN WHERE IN_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(MTR_CD,IN_DATE) ORDER BY MTR_CD,IN_DATE

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')),3,'자재입고량 합계', MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')),1,MTR_CD||' 소계',3,'-', TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')) AS IN_DATE, SUM(IN_AMT) AS CNT FROM MTR_IN WHERE TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(MTR_CD,TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')) ORDER BY MTR_CD,IN_DATE

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY')),3,'자재입고량 합계', MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD, TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY')),1,MTR_CD||' 소계',3,'-', TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY')) AS IN_DATE, SUM(IN_AMT) AS CNT FROM MTR_IN WHERE TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(MTR_CD,TO_CHAR(IN_DATE, 'YYYY')) ORDER BY MTR_CD,IN_DATE

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),MTR_CD),3,'자재출고량 합계',TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS out_dt, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),MTR_CD),1,TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' 소계',3,'-',MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, sum(out_amt) AS CNT, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),MTR_CD) as gpId FROM (select a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd, sum(a.out_amt) as out_amt from mtr_out a , mtr_lot_stck b where a.mtr_lot = b.mtr_lot group by a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd order by a.out_dt) WHERE TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , MTR_CD) ORDER BY out_dt, gpId, MTR_CD

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM'),MTR_CD),3,'자재출고량 합계',TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM')) AS out_dt, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM'),MTR_CD),1,TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM')||' 소계',3,'-',MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, sum(out_amt) AS CNT, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM'),MTR_CD) as gpId FROM (select a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd, sum(a.out_amt) as out_amt from mtr_out a , mtr_lot_stck b where a.mtr_lot = b.mtr_lot group by a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd order by a.out_dt) WHERE TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM') , MTR_CD) ORDER BY out_dt ,gpId, MTR_CD

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY'),MTR_CD),3,'자재출고량 합계',TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY')) AS out_dt, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY'),MTR_CD),1,TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY')||' 소계',3,'-',MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, sum(out_amt) AS CNT, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY'),MTR_CD) as gpId FROM (select a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd, sum(a.out_amt) as out_amt from mtr_out a , mtr_lot_stck b where a.mtr_lot = b.mtr_lot group by a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd order by a.out_dt) WHERE TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY') , MTR_CD) ORDER BY out_dt , gpId, MTR_CD

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD,out_dt),3,'자재출고량 합계',MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD,out_dt),1,MTR_CD||' 소계',3,'-',out_dt) AS out_dt, sum(out_amt) AS CNT FROM (select a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd, sum(a.out_amt) as out_amt from mtr_out a , mtr_lot_stck b where a.mtr_lot = b.mtr_lot group by a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd order by a.out_dt) WHERE out_dt BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(MTR_CD , out_dt) ORDER BY MTR_CD, out_dt

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD,TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM')),3,'자재출고량 합계',MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD,TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM')),1,MTR_CD||' 소계',3,'-',TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM')) AS out_dt, sum(out_amt) AS CNT FROM (select a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd, sum(a.out_amt) as out_amt from mtr_out a , mtr_lot_stck b where a.mtr_lot = b.mtr_lot group by a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd order by a.out_dt) WHERE TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(MTR_CD , TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY-MM')) ORDER BY MTR_CD, out_dt

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD,TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY')),3,'자재출고량 합계',MTR_CD) AS MTR_CD, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(MTR_CD,TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY')),1,MTR_CD||' 소계',3,'-',TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY')) AS out_dt, sum(out_amt) AS CNT FROM (select a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd, sum(a.out_amt) as out_amt from mtr_out a , mtr_lot_stck b where a.mtr_lot = b.mtr_lot group by a.out_dt, b.mtr_cd order by a.out_dt) WHERE TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(MTR_CD , TO_CHAR(out_dt, 'YYYY')) ORDER BY MTR_CD, out_dt

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),prd_cd),3,'제품생산량 합계',TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as work_fin_dt, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),prd_cd),1,TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' 소계',3,'-',prd_cd) as prd_cd, sum(pdt_cnt) as cnt, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),prd_cd) as gpId FROM (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) WHERE TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), prd_cd) ORDER BY work_fin_dt , gpId, prd_cd

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM'),prd_cd),3,'제품생산량 합계',TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')) AS work_fin_dt, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM'),prd_cd),1,TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')||' 소계',3,'-',prd_cd) AS prd_cd, sum(pdt_cnt) as cnt, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM'),prd_cd) as gpId FROM (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) WHERE TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM') between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM'), prd_cd) ORDER BY work_fin_dt , gpId, prd_cd

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY'),prd_cd),3,'제품생산량 합계',TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')) AS work_fin_dt, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY'),prd_cd),1,TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')||' 소계',3,'-',prd_cd) AS prd_cd, sum(pdt_cnt) as cnt, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY'),prd_cd) as gpId FROM (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) WHERE TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY') between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY'), prd_cd) ORDER BY work_fin_dt , gpId, prd_cd

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, work_fin_dt),3,'제품생산량 합계', prd_cd) AS prd_cd, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, work_fin_dt),1,prd_cd||' 소계',3,'-', work_fin_dt) AS work_fin_dt, sum(pdt_cnt) as cnt FROM (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) WHERE work_fin_dt between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(prd_cd, work_fin_dt) ORDER BY prd_cd, work_fin_dt

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')),3,'제품생산량 합계', prd_cd) AS prd_cd, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')),1,prd_cd||' 소계',3,'-', TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')) AS work_fin_dt, sum(pdt_cnt) as cnt FROM (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) WHERE TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM') between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')) ORDER BY prd_cd, work_fin_dt

SELECT DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')),3,'제품생산량 합계', prd_cd) AS prd_cd, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')),1,prd_cd||' 소계',3,'-', TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')) AS work_fin_dt, sum(pdt_cnt) as cnt FROM (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) WHERE TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY') between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY ROLLUP(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')) ORDER BY prd_cd, work_fin_dt

select DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),prd_cd),3,'제품불량량 합계',TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) as work_fin_dt, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),prd_cd),1,TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' 소계',3,'-',prd_cd) as prd_cd, sum(flt_cnt) as cnt, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),prd_cd) as gpId from (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) where TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} group by rollup(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), prd_cd) ORDER BY work_fin_dt , gpId, prd_cd

select DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM'),prd_cd),3,'제품불량량 합계',TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')) AS work_fin_dt, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM'),prd_cd),1,TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')||' 소계',3,'-',prd_cd) AS prd_cd, sum(flt_cnt) as cnt, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM'),prd_cd) as gpId from (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) where TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM') between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} group by rollup(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM'), prd_cd) ORDER BY work_fin_dt , gpId, prd_cd

select DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY'),prd_cd),3,'제품불량량 합계',TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')) AS work_fin_dt, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY'),prd_cd),1,TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')||' 소계',3,'-',prd_cd) AS prd_cd, sum(flt_cnt) as cnt, GROUPING_ID(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY'),prd_cd) as gpId from (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) where TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY') between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} group by rollup(TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY'), prd_cd) ORDER BY work_fin_dt , gpId, prd_cd

select DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, work_fin_dt),3,'제품불량량 합계', prd_cd) AS prd_cd, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, work_fin_dt),1,prd_cd||' 소계',3,'-', work_fin_dt) AS work_fin_dt, sum(flt_cnt) as cnt from (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) where work_fin_dt between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} group by rollup(prd_cd, work_fin_dt) order by prd_cd, work_fin_dt

select DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')),3,'제품불량량 합계', prd_cd) AS prd_cd, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')),1,prd_cd||' 소계',3,'-', TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')) AS work_fin_dt, sum(flt_cnt) as cnt from (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) where TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM') between #{startDate} AND #{endDate} group by rollup(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY-MM')) order by prd_cd, work_fin_dt

select DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')),3,'제품불량량 합계', prd_cd) AS prd_cd, DECODE(GROUPING_ID(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')),1,prd_cd||' 소계',3,'-', TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')) AS work_fin_dt, sum(flt_cnt) as cnt from (select a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, min(a.pdt_cnt) as pdt_cnt, sum(a.flt_cnt) as flt_cnt, b.prd_cd from prd_prc_mng a, pdt_work_instr_dtl b where a.instr_no = b.instr_no and a.line_no = b.line_no and a.prc_cd = b.prc_cd group by a.instr_no, a.work_fin_dt, b.prd_cd) where TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY') between '2020' AND '2022' group by rollup(prd_cd, TO_CHAR(work_fin_dt, 'YYYY')) order by prd_cd, work_fin_dt
